short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension rewinds 10 seconds and turns on subtitles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rewinds a certain number of seconds back (customizable) and turns on subtitles so you can hear what you missed.


Keyboard shortcuts in next update
